Translations.Text: Singiza izina rya Nyagasani wawe, Uwikirenga
We waremye akanatunganya (buri kintu)
Akanakigenera (gahunda yacyo yose), hanyuma akayikiyoboramo
Ni na We umeza ubwatsi mu nzuri
Hanyuma akabwumisha bugahindura ibara
Rwose (yewe Muhamadi) tuzakwigisha (gusoma Qur’an), bityo ntuzayibagirwa
Keretse ibyo Allah azashaka (ko wibagirwa). Mu by’ukuri azi ibigaragara n’ibitagaragara
Tuzanakorohereza inzira yo gukora ibyiza
Bityo, ibutsa (abantu) igihe urwibutso rwabagirira akamaro
Mu by’ukuri hazibuka wa wundi utinya (Allah)
Ariko inkozi y’ibibi izarugendera kure (urwibutso)
(Uwo) ni we uzajya mu muriro uhambaye (akawuhiramo)
Aho atazapfa (ngo aruhuke) cyangwa ngo agiriremo ubuzima (bwiza)
Mu by’ukuri wa wundi wiyejeje (akirinda ibyaha) yamaze kubona intsinzi
Akanasingiza izina rya Nyagasani we ndetse akanakora iswala
Ariko mwe mwikundira ubuzima bwo kuri iyi si
Nyamara ubwo ku mperuka ari bwo bwiza kurushaho ndetse buzanahoraho
Mu by’ukuri ibi (mubwirwa) biri mu byanditswe byo hambere
Inyandiko (zahishuriwe) Ibrahim na Musa
Ese inkuru y’ikizatwikira (abantu ku munsi w’imperuka) yakugezeho
Kuri uwo munsi, uburanga bwa bamwe buzaba busuzuguritse
(Igihe bari ku isi) babaga bakora bashishikaye (basenga ibindi bitari Allah), (ariko ku mperuka) bazaba bananiwe (kandi bafite ikimwaro)
Bazajya mu muriro utwika (bawuhiremo)
Kandi bazanyweshwa ku isoko (y’amazi) yatuye
Nta byo kurya bazaba bafite uretse ibyatsi birura kandi bifite amahwa
(Ibyo byo kurya) ntibizigera bibabyibushya cyangwa ngo bibamare inzara
Kuri uwo munsi kandi (ubundi) buranga buzaba bukeye
Bwishimiye ibikorwa byabwo
(Ba nyirabwo bazaba bari) mu Ijuru ry’ikirenga
Aho batazumva amanjwe
Hazaba harimo isoko itemba
Hazaba harimo ibitanda byigiye hejuru
N’ibikombe biteguwe (neza)
N’imisego itondetse ku mirongo (neza)
N’amatapi arambuye (biryoheye ijisho)
Ese ntibitegereza uko ingamiya zaremwe
N’uburyo ikirere cyahanitswe
N’uburyo imisozi yashimangiwe (mu butaka)
N’uburyo isi yarambuwe
Bityo, (yewe Muhamadi) bibutse kuko mu by’ukuri wowe uri uwibutsa
Ntukabashyireho igitugu
Ariko utera umugongo (urwibutso) akanahakana
Allah azamuhanisha ibihano bihambaye
Mu by’ukuri iwacu ni ho garukiro ryabo
Hanyuma mu by’ukuri ni twe tuzabakorera ibarura
Ndahiye umuseke
N’amajoro cumi (ya mbere y’ukwezi gutagatifu kwa Dhul-Hijja)
N’ikitari igiharwe ndetse n’igiharwe (mu biremwa byose bya Allah)
N’ijoro iyo rihita
Ese muri izo (ndahiro) ntiharimo ibimenyetso bifatika ku muntu ufite ubwenge (bituma areka ibyaha n’ubuhakanyi)
Ese (yewe Muhamadi) ntiwamenye uko Nyagasani wawe yagenje aba Adi
(Abantu b’) Irama (bari barebare cyane), bafite n’inyubako ndende (zifite inkingi ndende)
Bo (abo ba Irama) ntihigeze haremwa abandi bameze nka bo mu yindi mijyi
N’aba Thamudu bacongaga urutare mu bibaya (bakarukoramo inyubako)
Na Farawo wari ufite imambo (yazirikagaho abantu abakorera iyicarubozo)
Ba bandi bakoze ubugizi bwa nabi mu mijyi
Maze bayikwizamo ubwangizi bukabije
Nuko Nyagasani wawe abasukaho ibihano bibabaza
Mu by’ukuri Nyagasani wawe yiteguye guhana (inkozi z’ibibi)
Iyo Nyagasani agerageje umuntu, akamwubahisha akanamuhundagazaho ingabire, aravuga ati “Nyagasani wanjye yanyubahishije.”
Nyamara yamugerageza akamugabanyiriza amafunguro, akavuga ati “Nyagasani wanjye yaransuzuguje!”
Oya! Ahubwo ntimugirira neza imfubyi
Ndetse nta n’ubwo mubwirizanya kugaburira abakene
Kandi murya imirage (y’abandi) mukayimara
Ndetse mugakunda imitungo bikabije
Oya! Umunsi isi izasandazwa (igacikamo ibice)
Nuko Nyagasani wawe akaza (guca imanza) ndetse n’abamalayika bari ku mirongo ikurikiranye
Kandi uwo munsi umuriro wa Jahanamu uzazanwa. Kuri uwo munsi, umuntu azibuka, ariko se uko kwibuka kuzamumarira iki
Azicuza avuga ati “Iyaba nari narateganyirije ubuzima bwanjye (nkora ibikorwa byiza)
Kuri uwo munsi ibihano (Allah) azahanisha nta wundi ushobora kubihanisha
Kandi azanaboha (abahakanyi) ukuboha kutashoborwa n’undi uwo ari we wese
(Umwemeramana azabwirwa ati) “Yewe roho ituje!”
“Garuka kwa Nyagasani wawe umwishimiye na We akwishimiye!”
“Maze winjire mu bagaragu banjye (b’intungane)”
“Uninjire mu Ijuru ryanjye!”
